CX_129A.hgt.title: CX_129A HGT File
CX_129A.hgt.description: Digital elevation model (DEM) used during processing and ground projection

CX_129A.inc.title: CX_129A Incidence Angle File
CX_129A.inc.description: Ground range local incidence angle, the angle between the surface normal and the radar line of sight.

CX_129A.slope.title: CX_129A Terrain Slope File
CX_129A.slope.description: Ground range terrain slope containing the derivatives of the DEM in the East and North direction, used to compute the local incidence angle

CX_129A.rtc.title: CX_129A Radiometric Terrain Correction Factor
CX_129A.rtc.description: Radiometric terrain correction factor that can be applied to grd files

CX_129.h5.title: CX_129 HDF5 Data File
CX_129.h5.description: No Dither: 129 NMode HDF5 file in NISAR format
